attributes.action: Stop the radio stations playing east 17 stay another day at Christmas.
attributes.background: Right it's Christmas time again the radio and tomb stations are playing east 17's stay another day. It's not a xmas song it's a break up song about me mate Jimmy getting dumped by his lass.  There is no mention of Christmas in it at all.

rejection.details: This isn't something the Government or Parliament can do. You could write directly to radio stations to make this suggestion.
